questions.text: Who won in the chess game between Frasier and Norm?
questions.correct: Frasier & Crane & Dr. Crane & Dr Crane & Frasier Crane & Dr Frasier Crane & Dr. Frasier Crane
questions.explanation:
Frasier & Crane & Dr. Crane & Dr Crane & Frasier Crane & Dr Frasier Crane & Dr. Frasier Crane

	Woody told Norm a move he could make. But at the last minute Frasier is able to beat Norm. He's been beating everyone in the bar as he mentions later in the episode.

Loretta.

	Loretta said she caught Nick cheating on her. She came in hoping to talk to Carla but Carla wasn't interested.

questions.text: Who did Frasier call an idiot savant?
questions.explanation:
Woody.

	Woody was able to beat Frasier at chess. No one else could do that and Woody is not very bright so Frasier decided he was an idiot savant. A savant is someone with a mental disorder who can do something that is not normally an easy task. For example in this case, chess is not an easy game to play so when Woody can beat Frasier who is good at chess, Frasier concludes he is an idiot savant.

questions.text: When did Sam say he felt like he should be there for a woman?
questions.correct: When she didn't want to talk
questions.explanation:
When she didn't want to talk.

	Sam felt that the only time he needed to be around a woman was if there was sex involved. Diane was frustrated with Sam because of this.

questions.text: What 3 words did Carla say Nick would say?
questions.explanation:
"She's my cousin."

	Carla said that if Nick wanted Loretta back Loretta would have no choice but to go back to him. Nick seemed to have some type of power over the women in his life.

questions.text: What did Loretta get a job doing?
questions.explanation:
singing at Cheers.

	Diane convinced Sam to let Loretta sing at the bar. She wasn't very good at it however.

questions.text: For what did Nick forgive Loretta?
questions.correct: walking in on him and another woman in the shower
options: walking in on him and another woman on a date
walking in on him and another woman in bed
walking in on him and another woman in a parked car
questions.explanation:
walking in on him and another woman in the shower.

	Nick was a total sleeze who actually managed to convince Loretta she did something wrong when it was him who cheated on her. Loretta also was not very bright.

Woody.

	At the end he said "Oh yeah and bring me a six pack." Diane said no one would fall for that, just as Woody came from behind the bar carrying a six-pack of beer.

questions.text: Why did Frasier get upset with Woody?
questions.correct: He made noise every time he took one of Frasier's pieces.
options: He lost some of the chess pieces.
questions.explanation:
He made noise every time he took one of Frasier's pieces.

	Woody had beaten Frasier several times at chess. Frasier was frustrated by that already, and then on top of it Woody was making obnoxious noises every time he captured a chess piece.

questions.text: Who was the first person Nick did dinner for?
questions.explanation:
Diane.

	Nick thought Sam was trying to take Loretta from him. In response, he decided to go after Diane.
